transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello Hello

Customer: Hanji. Hello

Executive: Hello Hanji Hanji sir. India Agrograde LLP registered hai hamara company IndiaMART se.

Executive: Company ka naam ek bar bataiye sir.

Customer: Ficus India Agrograde LLP.

Executive: Ek minute sir. Hanji bataiye sir.

Customer: Inka ye account manager kaun hai iska?

Executive: Ek minute sir.

Executive: One minute sir one minute just one minute.

Executive: Ji ji sir main Mamta baat kar rahi hoon aapki account manager kal aapse baat hui thi na sir?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Hanji hanji wo service ke regarding baat ki thi aapne aap us time pe busy the sir. Ji ji.

Customer: Yaar daily do daily do buylead aate hai barabar hai?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: To wo aaj to aaye nahi shayad savere.

Executive: Ek minute sir.

Customer: Kal kal bhi zero zero tha sara.

Customer: Daily bonus weekly balance yearly everything was zero yesterday and today it was zero.

Executive: Ek minute aaj jaise ek lead aayi hai aapke pass sirf ek lead aapne consume ki hai sir wo bhi shayad kal wali lead thi sir hai na?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ji ji ji. To aaj matlab koi lead nahi aaya hai iske alava ek 17 minute pehle ek lead aaya hai sir 100 ton ka is ye lead dekha tha aapne sir?

Customer: Ha par wo mera jo hai bonus daily bonus wohi wo zero hai. How can I take that na? It is directly showing me to tell to they are telling telling me to buy.

Executive: Accha accha main bata rahi hoon sir wo jaise kya hota hai na by default jabhi bhi aap lead consume karte ho to sabse pehle bonus wala lead hi use hota hai sir. To abhi jaise main aapka buylead balance bata rahi hoon sir ek minute rukiye.

Executive: Ek minute sir.

Executive: Ye aapka jo dikh raha hai ek minute. Ha aapka jo weekly wala lead tha khatam ho gaya sir pura use kar chuke hain aap aur aapka daily bonus wala bhi khatam ho gaya hai sir. Ye aap is week mein pura lead pura aapko agar

Customer: Nahi nahi. Ha daily bonus kiska uthaya humne puch rahe hai.

Executive: Daily bonus aaya to tha jo use kar chuke hai sir rukiye main screenshot bhej rahi hoon sir.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Kyunki hota kya hai ki jabhi bhi aap koi lead consume karte ho na sir to sabse pehle bonus ka hi use hota hai sir by default aapka bonus hi use hoga jo aapne use kiya hai na sir isliye dikh rahi hoon.

Customer: Ye 100 ton wala abhi free me de sakte ho?

Executive: Main kya sir?

Customer: Ye 100 ton wala jo lead wo aap free me de sakte hai abhi mujhe?

Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo hota nahi hai na kyunki jit jitna access aapke pass hoga weekly lead ka to wo uska rehta hai iske liye to fir aapko malum hi hoga ki aapko pay karke mujhe daily bonus ke hisab se do aa jayenge right?

Executive: Koi nahi ek kam kar lijiye na sir 12 baje ke baad to allocate ho hi jayega aapko. Thik hai tab usko consume kar lena agar available hoga to kyunki iske liye fir kyun aap apna extra 452 rupees pay karoge.

Executive: Ek lead ka cost 452 include GST padta hai sir.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: To wo cheez rehti hai kyunki aapki jitni bucket mein rehti hai na utna hi use hota hai aur maine apna number aapko share kar diya tha sir kuch dikkat hoga na to mujhe call kar lijiyega confusion clear hai koi aur

Executive: Ha ek minute sir main aap call pe hi rahiye.

Executive: Ye dekhiye sir maine hi karke bheja aapko.

Executive: Thik hai ye mera number hai aap isko save kar lijiye Mamta ke name se aur koi dikkat to nahi sir?

Customer: Nahi aur koi dikkat nahi.

Executive: Hanji. Khush aap wait kar lijiye sir kyun 500 lagane jaoge sir hai na wait kar lijiye agar lead rahega to 12 baje ke baad turant usko consume kar lijiyega sir. Thik hai baki ye concern close kar rahi hoon sir jo cheez maine aapko batai hai aapke liye hopefully cheeze clear hongi sir hai na?

Customer: Thank you.

Executive: Thik hai thank you so much sir bye sir bye.

Customer: Bye bye thank you.

Executive: Bye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no buyleads received today.

- Daily bonus showing zero.

- Wants 100-ton lead for free.



Resolution:

- Executive explained bonus lead usage.

- Informed weekly and daily bonus leads exhausted.

- Shared contact number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to wait until 12 for lead allocation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, daily bonus, lead consumption, weekly leads
